title: New Jersey State Income Tax Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: R_\text{eff} = \begin{cases} \frac{T}{I} & \text{if } I>0 \\ 0 & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} \qquad R_\text{marginal} = r_j \text{ where } TI \in [b_j, b_{j+1})
formulas.raw: R_\text{eff} = \begin{cases} \frac{T}{I} & \text{if } I>0 \\ 0 & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} \qquad R_\text{marginal} = r_j \text{ where } TI \in [b_j, b_{j+1})

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Personal exemptions: $$ E = E_\text{self} + E_\text{spouse} + 1{,}500 \times D + 1{,}000 \times A $$ where - \(E_\text{self} = 1{,}000\) - \(E_\text{spouse} = \begin{cases}1{,}000 & \text{if status âˆˆ {MFJ, QW}} \\ 0 & \text{otherwise}\end{cases}\) - \(D\) = number of dependents - \(A\) = count of age/blind additions (1 for self; +1 for spouse if MFJ/QW) Taxable income: $$ TI = \max(0, I - E) $$ Progressive tax (piecewise): Let brackets be \([b_0,b_1,\dots,b_n]\) with rates \([r_0,r_1,\dots,r_{n-1}]\). Then total tax is: $$ T = \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} r_k \cdot \max\!\big(0, \min(TI, b_{k+1}) - b_k \big) $$ Effective and marginal rates: $$ R_\text{eff} = \begin{cases} \frac{T}{I} & \text{if } I>0 \\ 0 & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} \qquad R_\text{marginal} = r_j \text{ where } TI \in [b_j, b_{j+1}) $$

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
